thread.title: Obama’s bid for more affordable homes is lifting house prices - MarketWatch
thread.title_full: Obama’s bid for more affordable homes is lifting house prices - MarketWatch

author: MarketWatch
title: Obama’s bid for more affordable homes is lifting house prices - MarketWatch
text:
MARKETWATCH FRONT PAGE A move to lower FHA premiums may be working opposite to the way President Obama imagined. See full story.
Live video and updates from Hillary Clinton’s Benghazi testimony Updates from Hillary Clinton's testimony to the Select Committee on Benghazi. See full story.
Why some young American farmers want their student loans forgiven Advocates and bipartisan legislators are pushing a proposal to include farming among the public service fields entitled to student debt forgiveness. See full story.
Can the 1% really pay for the ‘free stuff’ Democrats want? Can the 1% really pay for “free stuff” for everybody else? Tim Mullaney looks at the math and decides the numbers just might work. See full story.
Jim Cramer loses big in this stock-picking test A six-month review of investor Jim Cramer’s stock picks show that buying based on an expert’s list is often a losing move, Michael Sincere reports. See full story.
MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE China, where driving a Buick and drinking a PBR are signs you’ve made it. See full story.
